title: B.I.G's Minpyo to take a break from group due to health issues | allkpop.com
text:
Or Login / Register With Us Forgot Password? Remember Me B.I.G's Minpyo to take a break from group due to health issues By jennywill 9 minutes ago 999 129 2 0 Google+ B.I.G will be promoting for the time being as a 4-member group. Member Minpyo will be taking a break from the group because of his health. The boys will be promoting their new song " 1, 2, 3 ", which will be released on the 13th, as a 4 member group without Minpyo. SEE ALSO: B.I.G (Boys In Groove) to make a comeback with a brighter image 
Their label, GH Entertainment , said, " Hello, this is GH Entertainment. B.I.G's Minpyo will be taking a temporary break because of his health. We are sorry for worrying fans because of this sudden news. Recently, because of comeback preparations and frequent overseas schedules, Minpyo's health deteriorated severely. After conferring, we decided that his recovery was the top priority, and that he would be focusing on his recovery. Because of this, B.I.G's 5th single album '1, 2, 3' will be promoted with 4 members J-Hoon , Benji , Gunmin , and Heedo . GH Entertainment will keep supporting Minpyo so he can come back to fans healthily. We ask for your support, and ask for your unchanging interest and support in B.I.G. Thank you. " 
Hopefully he gets better soon! YOU MAY LIKE GET AKP IN YOUR INBOX! ..or follow allkpop to stay updated: Tags:
